title: Full English Breakfast for £3.25 at Tea on the Green (£6.95 Value)
highlights:
• Includes all elements of the Tea on the Green traditional breakfast
  • Central location with idyllic view of Exeter Cathedral
  • Locally sourced ingredients where possible to make for guilt free indulgence
  • Independently owned cafe
